subject: JBuilder 7 Enterprise and upgrading JUnit
msgSnippet: My installation of JBuilder 7 Enterprise has built-in/integrated support for JUnit 3.7.  I m curious if anybody knows how to update the IDE integration to use
messageBody:
My installation of JBuilder 7 Enterprise has built-in/integrated
support for JUnit 3.7. I'm curious if anybody knows how to update
the IDE integration to use JUnit 3.8.1. Thanks.
